item.title: Budapest mayor questioned by police over banned pride march
item.description: Speaking on Friday, Karacsony told supporters: "Neither freedom nor love can be banned in Budapest".

item.title: Ghislaine Maxwell moved to women's prison in Texas
item.description: The move comes a week after Maxwell, who is serving a 20-year sentence for sex trafficking, met a top Justice Department official about the Epstein ca...

item.title: Trump moves nuclear submarines after Russian ex-president's comments
item.description: US President Donald Trump says two nuclear submarines are being deployed in the "appropriate regions".

item.title: Italy plan to process migrants in Albania dealt blow by EU court
item.description: The court says the way Italy defines a "safe" country breaks EU law.

item.title: Putin not swayed by Trump's Ukraine war ultimatum
item.description: The Russian president says Moscow's initial tough demands must be met, despite a looming US sanctions deadline.
